metadata.abstractText: This paper studies the connection between probabilistic conditional independence in un­ certain reasoning and data dependency in re­ lational databases. As a demonstration of the usefulness of this preliminary investigation, an alternate proof is presented for refuting the conjecture suggested by Pearl and Paz that probabilistic conditional independencies have a complete axiomatization.
